events.name: EV battery supply chain vulnerability assessment
events.wd_label: EV battery supply chain vulnerability assessment
events.wd_description: Assessing the vulnerability of the electric vehicle battery supply chain, focusing on the critical minerals lithium, cobalt, nickel, and manganese.
events.description: Assessing the vulnerability of the electric vehicle battery supply chain, focusing on the critical minerals lithium, cobalt, nickel, and manganese.

events.name: Supply chain mapping
events.wd_description: Mapping the global supply chains for lithium, cobalt, nickel, and manganese, with a focus on NMC and LFP cathode chemistries.
events.description: Mapping the global supply chains for lithium, cobalt, nickel, and manganese, with a focus on NMC and LFP cathode chemistries.

events.name: NMC cathode supply chain
events.wd_description: Mapping the supply chain for nickel manganese cobalt (NMC) cathodes, highlighting the concentration of supply stages in China.
events.description: Mapping the supply chain for nickel manganese cobalt (NMC) cathodes, highlighting the concentration of supply stages in China.

events.name: LFP cathode supply chain
events.wd_description: Mapping the supply chain for lithium iron phosphate (LFP) cathodes, with a focus on the role of China in the supply chain.
events.description: Mapping the supply chain for lithium iron phosphate (LFP) cathodes, with a focus on the role of China in the supply chain.

events.name: Vulnerability index calculation
events.wd_description: Calculating a vulnerability index for NMC and LFP cathode chemistries, taking into account the global distribution of supply chain stages.
events.description: Calculating a vulnerability index for NMC and LFP cathode chemistries, taking into account the global distribution of supply chain stages.

events.name: NMC vulnerability index
events.wd_description: Calculating the vulnerability index for NMC cathodes, focusing on the dependence on China and other countries for critical minerals.
events.description: Calculating the vulnerability index for NMC cathodes, focusing on the dependence on China and other countries for critical minerals.

events.name: LFP vulnerability index
events.wd_description: Calculating the vulnerability index for LFP cathodes, with a high dependency on China for lithium processing.
events.description: Calculating the vulnerability index for LFP cathodes, with a high dependency on China for lithium processing.

events.name: Network flow optimization
events.wd_description: Using network flow optimization to account for uncertainties in the supply chain and improve the accuracy of vulnerability assessments.
events.description: Using network flow optimization to account for uncertainties in the supply chain and improve the accuracy of vulnerability assessments.

events.name: Policy impacts
events.wd_description: Evaluating the impact of policy measures on the vulnerability of the battery supply chain and providing recommendations for reducing risks.
events.description: Evaluating the impact of policy measures on the vulnerability of the battery supply chain and providing recommendations for reducing risks.

events.name: Domestic production incentives
events.wd_description: Analyzing the effects of policies that incentivize domestic production of battery materials to reduce supply chain vulnerabilities.
events.description: Analyzing the effects of policies that incentivize domestic production of battery materials to reduce supply chain vulnerabilities.

events.name: International cooperation
events.wd_description: Promoting international cooperation and sourcing from allied countries to mitigate supply chain risks and ensure stable supplies of critical minerals.
events.description: Promoting international cooperation and sourcing from allied countries to mitigate supply chain risks and ensure stable supplies of critical minerals.

events.name: Regulatory frameworks
events.wd_description: Developing regulatory frameworks to monitor and manage supply chain vulnerabilities, focusing on economic, sustainability, and national security risks.
events.description: Developing regulatory frameworks to monitor and manage supply chain vulnerabilities, focusing on economic, sustainability, and national security risks.

events.name: Economic Sustainability and National Security Risks
